tool.name: qiime2 vsearch merge-pairs

param.name: demultiplexed_seqs
param.label: demultiplexed_seqs: SampleData[PairedEndSequencesWithQuality]
param.help: [required] The demultiplexed paired-end sequences to be merged.

param.name: truncqual
param.label: truncqual: Int % Range(0, None)
param.help: [optional] Truncate sequences at the first base with the specified quality score value or lower.

param.name: minlen
param.label: minlen: Int % Range(0, None)
param.help: [default: 1] Sequences shorter than minlen after truncation are discarded.

param.name: maxns
param.label: maxns: Int % Range(0, None)
param.help: [optional] Sequences with more than maxns N characters are discarded.

param.name: allowmergestagger
param.label: allowmergestagger: Bool
param.help: [default: No] Allow merging of staggered read pairs.

param.name: minovlen
param.label: minovlen: Int % Range(5, None)
param.help: [default: 10] Minimum length of the area of overlap between reads during merging.

param.name: maxdiffs
param.label: maxdiffs: Int % Range(0, None)
param.help: [default: 10] Maximum number of mismatches in the area of overlap during merging.

param.name: minmergelen
param.label: minmergelen: Int % Range(0, None)
param.help: [optional] Minimum length of the merged read to be retained.

param.name: maxmergelen
param.label: maxmergelen: Int % Range(0, None)
param.help: [optional] Maximum length of the merged read to be retained.

param.name: maxee
param.label: maxee: Float % Range(0.0, None)
param.help: [optional] Maximum number of expected errors in the merged read to be retained.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: vsearch merge-pairs ============================ Merge paired-end reads.
Outputs: -------- :merged_sequences.qza: The merged sequences. :unmerged_sequences.qza: The unmerged paired-end reads.
|
Description: ------------ Merge paired-end sequence reads using vsearch's merge_pairs function. See the vsearch documentation for details on how paired-end merging is performed, and for more information on the parameters to this method.
|
